channel.title: picoCTF 2022 on BMHS TSA
channel.description: Recent content in picoCTF 2022 on BMHS TSA

item.title: Noted
item.description: Challenge Rating Artificialness: 3/10 Skill: 8/10 Time: 2-3 days Learn more about how we rate challenges here. Preface This write-up assumes you have a moderate to advanced understanding of SOP (Same-Origin Policy) and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing). If you don’t, you should check out MDN’s SOP and CORS articles. One other thing you should note (Pun intended) is that, despite what the challenge description says, the headless browser DOES have internet access.
